jobExperiences.responsibilities:
• I participated in the migration of the “System Admin” system from RPGLE Modules to the WEB using React and contributed to the improvement of the company’s payment systems (GAPTS, GCMS and MISC);
  • Contributed to the improvement of the performance of requests to the Back-end through the analysis of the CloudIBM and Cirrus platforms;
  • Worked on analyzing and fixing of vulnerabilities related to Cookies, CORS, and PseudoRandom Number using SonarQube;
  • React (Hooks, Redux, NextJS, Router, Axios, Context) as the main development tool;
  • Built unit tests using Jest ensuring more than 90% of coverage in each file;
  • Prepared reports and test results in .Docx, .pdf, and .xls formats for presentation during meetings;
  • Modernized the design of the web application using Carbon Design components;
  • I was recognized for my effort, dedication, and commitment to work, as I did a good teamwork and solved tasks efficiently;
  • Also worked on the analysis and approval of Pull Requests (GitHub) in DEV, UAT, and PROD environments.

jobExperiences.jobTitle: IT Support and Infraestructure - Young Apprentice
jobExperiences.responsibilities:
• I worked on the Employee Support resolving issues related to access and maintenance of IT equipment at Medgrupo;
  • Carried out VPN configuration for Windows, Linux, and Apple environments;
  • Resolved issues through remote access and configured employee access to the cloud;
  • Worked on resetting and configuring users in systems like Active Directory and Google Admin;
  • Used Zabbix for monitoring, addressing issues such as the status of equipment and systems;
  • This experience enhanced my analytical skills and adaptability.

jobExperiences.jobTitle: Graphic and WEB Designer & Audivisual Editor
jobExperiences.responsibilities:
• As a freelancer, I offered a full range of services in design and audiovisual production;
  • Actively participated in UX/UI Design, providing visual services for websites and developing landing pages;
  • Made logos, resumes, brochures, banners, and other design elements;
  • Expanded my expertise to video and audio editing, distinguishing myself in the creation of attractive vignettes for YouTubers and online influencers;
  • Produced Reels, posts, and banners adapted for various social media platforms, with a focus on Instagram.

projects.projectDescription: This is the first professional project I have worked as afreelancer! React/Vite and SCSS are the main technologies ofthis project! Clinica Do Paião is a medical clinic situated onPaião in Portugal, that offers medical services! Like GeneralClinic, Psycology, Physioterapy, acupunture and other ones!

projects.projectArea: Web Development, Design UX/UI and Data Base
projects.projectDescription: Here is the summary of my oficial portfolio! React/Vite, SCSS and Json are the main technologies on thisproject! Also have other ones such as HTML, CSS and JavaScript(Obviously), Swiper JS, Reveal JS, fontAwesome, RectDOM, Router,Hooks, sonarLint and GitHub Pages! NPM and Git for versioncontrol!The main goal of this project is display my skills, professionaljourney and Works (Professional and Personal)!

Project Overview:
La Chica Store is a fictional online fashion retail platform crea as a training project to hone my design skills. The goal was develop an engaging and visually appealing home page that provide seamless shopping experience.

Responsibilities:
  • Logo Design: Designed a unique and memorable logo that reflects tthe brand’s identity and appeals to fashion enthusiasts.
  • Layout Design: Developed a modern, clean, and responsive layout fthe homepage, ensuring an intuitive and enjoyable user experienacross all devices.
  • Component Creation: Designed various UI components such navigation menus,product showcases, and call-to-action buttons create a cohesive andintuitive interface.
  • Visual Design: Utilized Adobe XD and Photoshop to craft visual compelling graphics and elements that align with the brandaesthetic and enhance the overall user experience.

Tools Used:
  • Adobe XD: Used for wireframing, prototyping, and creatinteractive design elements.
  • Photoshop: Employed for detailed graphic design work, including creation and image editing.

Outcome:
The fictional home page of La Chica Store effectively combines functionality with a stylish design, resulting in an engaging user-friendly prototype that showcases my design capabilities creativity.

Project Overview:
App Music (ML) is a fictional music streaming application designed to enhance user interaction with navigable and intuitive layout. This project served as a platform to practice and refine my design skills, focusing on creating an engaging and seamless user experience.

Responsibilities:
  • Logo Design: Created a distinctive and modern logo that captures the essence of the music stream service and resonates with the target audience.
  • Layout Design: Developed a navigable and user-friendly layout, ensuring that users can easily browse discover music. The design emphasizes smooth navigation and accessibility.
  • Component Creation: Designed various UI components including menus, playlists, music player controls, search functions to ensure a cohesive and intuitive interface.
  • Visual Design: Leveraged Adobe XD and Photoshop to produce visually appealing graphics and design elemethat align with the app's modern and vibrant aesthetic.

Tools Used:
  • Adobe XD: Utilized for wireframing, prototyping, and creating interactive design elements.
  • Photoshop: Used for detailed graphic design work, including logo creation and image editing.

Outcome:
The fictional App Music (ML) features a navigable and visually engaging layout that provides users witseamless music discovery and listening experience. This project demonstrates my ability to desigfunctional and aesthetically pleasing user interface for a music application.
